DOCNAME: CASE OF MP KINESKOP v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant company , together with CARDINAL other plaintiffs , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON , all represented by the same lawyer , filed an action against ORG of ORG and PERSON seeking compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage on account of the unlawful seizure of goods .
